text: Hum ney her insan ko apnay maa baap kay sath acha salook kerney ki naseehat ki hai haan agar woh yeh kosish keren kay aap meray sath ussay shareek ker len jiss ka aap ko ilm nahi to unn ka kehna na maniyey tum sab ka lotna meri hi taraf hai phir mein her uss cheez say jo tum kertay thay tumhen khabar doon ga
